snippet: A researcher in Taiwan was accused of creating online accounts to judge his own academic papers in the journal called a “peer-review and citation ring.”
abstract: Sage Publications' The Journal of Vibration and Control retracts 60 papers linked to Taiwan researcher Chen-Yuan Chen, accusing him of 'perverting the peer-review process' by creating fraudulent online accounts to judge papers favorably and help get them published.
lead_paragraph: A researcher in Taiwan was accused of creating online accounts to judge his own academic papers in the journal called a “peer-review and citation ring.”

headline.main: Science Journal Pulls 60 Papers in Peer-Review Fraud
headline.print_headline: Science Journal Pulls 60 Papers in Peer-Review Fraud
